product_description: Carry your phone in style using this compact leather crossbody bag featuring a graphic print from Ganni's latest collection.
product_details_and_care:
Carry your phone in style using this compact leather crossbody bag featuring a graphic print from Ganni's latest collection. A logo-engraved zip pull adds a bespoke touch, and a detachable strap turns it into a standout clutch.
Zip-around closure
Removable, adjustable crossbody bag
Four interior card slots
Leather
Imported
Designer Handbags
Item #6071521
product_size_info:
Dimensions: 4 1/4"W x 7 1/4"H x 3/4"D.
21 1/2” – 23 1/4” crossbody strap drop.
